INSERT INTO TB_CATEGORY_USER ( ESNTL_ID, CATEGORY_NO, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, DELETE_AT ) VALUES ( #{esntlId}, #{categoryNo}, SYSDATE, #{loginEsntlId}, SYSDATE, #{loginEsntlId}, 'N' )

/* CategoryMapper.getCategoryList */
SELECT A.CATEGORY_NAME, A.CATEGORY_NO FROM TB_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_USER B ON B.CATEGORY_NO = A.CATEGORY_NO WHERE B.ESNTL_ID = #{esntlId} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'

/* CategoryMapper.getCategoryName */
SELECT A.CATEGORY_NO, A.CATEGORY_NAME, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.NAME, B.ESNTL_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.PROJECT_ID, C.PROJECT_NM FROM TB_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON B.ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PROJECT C ON C.PROJECT_ID = A.PROJECT_ID WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'

/* CategoryMapper.getMemberListToInvite */
SELECT C.NAME, C.EMAIL, C.ESNTL_ID FROM TB_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PROJECT_USER B ON B.PROJECT_ID = A.PROJECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER C ON C.ESNTL_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} MINUS SELECT B.NAME, B.EMAIL, B.ESNTL_ID FROM TB_CATEGORY_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON B.ESNTL_ID = A.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}
